entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 70
EAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 70
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 60
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
